overview:
Mark Barnekow has spent over two decades bringing entrepreneurial perspectives and new innovations to companies around the globe. He has proven experience operating within traditional supply chains and making them more efficient and dynamic. Over the last 10 years, Mark specialized in developing internet software-as-a-service solutions to help foodservice and retail manufacturers, distributors, and operators manage their supply chains more efficiently.

Prior to Global Fresh Foods, Mark was President of iTradeNetwork and CEO and President of Amphire Solutions from the companyâ€™s founding through its sale to Accel/KKR. As Chief Executive Officer, Mark guided the company’s sales strategy, merger and acquisitions, international expansion and overall company vision. He has been recognized by the San Francisco Business Times for his contributions in business and the community by awarding him the prestigious Most Admired CEO Award. In 2012 he was an Executive of the Year finalist in the national Stevie Awards.
